name: Rugby League 3
overview: Rugby League 3 brings the realistic and popular rugby franchise to the Wii for the first time. The game features visceral Wii Remote motion controls that bring the physicality of Rugby League into your living room. 80+ licensed teams are featured in competitions such as the NRL, Super League, Toyota Cup, UK Championship, UK Championship 1, State of Origin, City v Country and internationals. Team level gameplay features including defensive line controls, attacking strategy selection, team confidence, and AI support play.
